backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, clue uploads for video/image/audio, and answer generation with internal ID tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting an update to the EmptyState tagline and the associated files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across components, hooks, styling, and PWA setup.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining the app’s light/dark OKLCH color system and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry including PWA meta tags, manifest links, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app name, icons, colors, and display behavior for installation.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, runtime caching, and offline support with network-first navigation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, profile setup, riddle text input, clue upload components, and answer generation UI.
frontend/src/components/AnswerGeneration: UI for generating an answer using riddle text and image clue IDs, handling input parsing, API calls, and result display.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with app branding, PWA install button, and authentication status display.
Handles selecting, validating, uploading, and tracking progress of audio clue files with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Displays authentication state and provides sign-in/out controls via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Landing screen showing welcome message, image, and onboarding steps for new users.
Manages selection, validation, and upload of image clue files with progress and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
Provides a UI for selecting, queuing, and uploading video files with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Detects PWA installability, tracks install state, and exposes a function to prompt installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, clues, and generated answers using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark detective-themed UI palettes.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Formats principal IDs by shortening them with a prefix and suffix.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by mounting React, initializing QueryClient, and wrapping with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with support for hash-based routing and session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color palette, extended animations, and typography/container/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata and feature requests related to updating the pre-login landing page tagline.
